LanguageData.EPOE_OrganicOptimizing.label: Optimize natural body part
LanguageData.EPOE_OrganicOptimizing.description: Improve and bring out the potential of a natural body part with the organic optimizing nanobots, with the surgeon carefully monitoring the initial application and progress.
LanguageData.EPOE_InstinctOptimizingEyes.label: Improve reactive pupil
LanguageData.EPOE_InstinctOptimizingEyes.description: Improve the instinctual reaction of the eyes with instinct optimizing nanobots, improving hit and aim accuracy. The surgeon carefully monitoring the initial application and progress.
LanguageData.EPOE_InstinctOptimizingHands.label: Improve hand reflex
LanguageData.EPOE_InstinctOptimizingHands.description: Improve the instinctual reaction of the hands with instinct optimizing nanobots, improving the speed of aiming, striking with a melee weapon and general repetative work. with the surgeon carefully monitoring the initial application and progress.
LanguageData.EPOE_InstinctOptimizingFoot.label: Improve nimble instinct
LanguageData.EPOE_InstinctOptimizingFoot.description: Improve the instinctual reaction of the feet with instinct optimizing nanobots, improving the ability to dodge incoming melee attacks. The surgeon carefully monitoring the initial application and progress.
